welcome_message_body: Welcome to Antony, France! Known for its beautiful parks, charming streets, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds or time restrictions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi service is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi available throughout the airport, but may require registration and have limited connection time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
